thread.title: Linda Brewer
thread.title_full: Saatva Mattress reviewed by Linda Brewer

author: Linda Brewer
title: Linda Brewer
text: The Loom & Leaf mattress is an extraordinary product! I have been sleeping on it for a month, and no longer wake every 2 to 3 hours with back and leg discomfort. The change for me in quality of sleep has been dramatic! i can now sleep soundly for 7 hours straight -- something I had not been able to do for several years! I am pleased with the materials used to manufacture the mattress as well, and the fact that it is made in the U.S. Thank you to the Loom & Leaf team for providing this remarkable product!!
